data.title: Microsoft Embraces Hybrid IT Model
data.text: Microsoft’s better-than-feared 4Q results ease significant concern regarding the trade-related slowdown impact.

data.title: Microsoft's Project xCloud preview goes public in October, sign up now
data.text: The Android-toting public will finally be able to try Microsoft's long-awaited game streaming service.

data.title: Microsoft to begin public trials of Project xCloud game streaming service in October
data.text: Microsoft’s highly anticipated Project xCloud game streaming service, which lets users play high-powered Xbox games like Halo on their smartphones, will be available to the public for the first time starting in October.

data.title: Microsoft will soon let you play Xbox games from Android phones
data.text: Microsoft will begin letting consumers preview its xCloud game streaming service in October. It will run on Android phones and tablets.

data.title: Microsoft sends another warning: Update Windows now to fix critical security issues
data.text: Microsoft issued two emergency Windows updates Monday to protect against "critical" and "important" vulnerabilities impacting Internet Explorer and Windows Defender, the anti-virus software.

data.title: Windows 10 reaches 900M devices as Microsoft inches closer to 1 billion milestone
data.text: Microsoft is closing in on a big milestone for Windows 10.

data.title: Windows 10 now runs on over 900M devices
data.text: So you thought there were 800 million Windows 10 Devices that will get Microsoft’s most recent out-of-band emergency patch? Think again.

data.title: Microsoft urges Windows users to install emergency security patch
data.text: Microsoft has warned Windows users to install an “emergency” out-of-band security patch. The software giant said in an advisory that a security flaw in some versions of Internet Explorer could allow an attacker to remotely run malicious code on an affected device.

data.title: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Solutions Gain Retailer Traction
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) is expected to benefit from growing adoption of its latest Dynamics 365 offerings, updated with robust enhancements.
